sections.summary: personable cad designer/drafter who communicates openly and effectively with all involved, from construction site workers to company ceos. successfully sees projects through from initial planning stages to completion.highly skilled with broad expertise. successful at anticipating future issues and implementing creative solutions. highlights map creation software land development planning topographic studies erosion and sedimentation control surveying technical plan execution local municipality projects civil 3d land use approval process autocad specialist construction surveying water piping design permit applications complex problem solver inland empire regional knowledge advanced critical thinking highly accurate strong decision maker independent worker
